name: Trapped (itch) (Friendly Neighbourhood Game Dev)
description:
Trapped is a short (<1h) but compelling 3D puzzle game. With no tools or knowledge about your circumstances (other than that you ended up stranded in a strange pit apparently), you only have your wits to guide your way out of your predicament. Onward, adventurer!

NB: controller required; keyboard/mouse is NOT supported at present. The controls are:

Left stick - move the character

Right stick - rotate the camera

RB - interact

Start - pause menu
